name: Ben Deverett @ Github
body:
This page is a hub for some of my projects.

***

* [EEG Instrument](https://github.com/bensondaled/mumt306final): final project for MUMT306 at McGill. A MIDI musical instrument controlled by signals from a single-electrode EEG routed through Python.

* [Tempo Detection](https://github.com/bensondaled/mumt307final): final project for MUMT307 at McGill. A Matlab implementation of a tempo-detection algorithm.

* [pyfluo](https://github.com/bensondaled/pyfluo): a Python library for analysis of 2-photon calcium imaging data.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
